assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vardhman Special Steels Limited manufactures and sells billets, steel bars, and bright bars of various categories of special and alloy steels in India and internationally. The company serves engineering, automotive, tractor, bearing, and allied industries. Vardhman Special Steels Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Ludhiana, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Satish Kumar Tuli
companyOfficers.title: Sr. Gen. Mang. of Projects & Technical
